text: A MAN has been charged with the murder of his mother and sister in Millom. John Jenkin, 23, of Newton Street, Millom was arrested Saturday morning after police found two women dead in a house. The victims have been identified as mother Alice McMeekin, 58, of Newton Street, Millom and her 20 - year - old daughter Kathryn Jenkin of Aberdare, South Wales. Police have this morning charged him and he will appear before Furness District Magistrates. He has also been charged with animal cruelty after the family dog was discovered dead.
title: Millom double murder : Man charged with killing mother and sister.
